data.title: Carroll County, Georgia Population 2024
data.text:
Carroll County, Georgia 's estimated 2024 population is 129,666 with a growth rate of 2.02% in the past year according to the most recent United States census data. Carroll County, Georgia is the 20th largest county in Georgia. The 2010 population was 110,655 and has seen a growth of 17.18% since that time.

16.88%

Overall Poverty Rate

15.33%

Male Poverty Rate

18.36%

Female Poverty Rate

Poverty in Carroll County, Georgia

The race most likely to be in poverty in Carroll County, Georgia is Native , with 41.79% below the poverty level.

The race least likely to be in poverty in Carroll County, Georgia is White , with 12.62% below the poverty level.

The poverty rate among those that worked full-time for the past 12 months was 3.46% . Among those working part-time, it was 23.67% , and for those that did not work, the poverty rate was 25.3% .
